segments.advisor_message: Let's discuss the details of your dependents. Could you please provide me with their full name?
segments.client_message: Sure, my dependent's name is Emily Johnson.

segments.advisor_message: Thank you. And when was Emily born? I need the date of birth in DD-MM-YYYY format.
Great! Lastly, is there a specific date until which Emily will be considered as a dependent?
segments.client_message: Yes, she will be a dependent until 15-05-2033.
